Container.Name: Twitch-Channel-Points-Miner
Container.Overview: First of all please create a run.py file. You can just copy example.py and modify it according to your needs. Make sure that int the run.py directory isn't another directory with run.py. Paste your run.py in /mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/run.py/ . https://github.com/rdavydov/Twitch-Channel-Points-Miner-v2/blob/master/example.py
Container.Description:
First of all please create a run.py file. You can just copy example.py and modify it according to your needs. Make sure that int the run.py directory isn't another directory with run.py. Paste your run.py in /mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/run.py/ . https://github.com/rdavydov/Twitch-Channel-Points-Miner-v2/blob/master/example.py
bridge
5000 5000 tcp
/mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/analytics/ /usr/src/app/analytics/ rw
/mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/cookies/ /usr/src/app/cookies/ rw
/mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/logs/ /usr/src/app/logs/ rw
/mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/run.py/run.py /usr/src/app/run.py rw
/mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/analytics/ /mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/cookies/ /mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/logs/ /mnt/user/appdata/twitchminer/run.py/run.py 5000
